ars_creo.page1.starbuncle_wheel: Generates rotational force for Create. Placing a gold block in front of the wheel will increase the RPM.
ars_creo.page.behaviors: Ars Creo enables special contraption behaviors for blocks from Ars Nouveau, including Incantation Turrets and Source Jars. Basic Incantation Turret - Fires a incantation on contraption when interacted. Timer Turret - Fires a incantation on its interval. Enchanted Incantation Turret - Fires a incantation every new block visited. Source Jar - Can be consumed by turrets on a contraption.
ars_creo.page1.ars_creo.display_link: The display link can be attached to a Source Jar to display the amount of source in a jar, or to a incantation turret to display the current incantation onto a Display Board.
ars_creo.page1.ars_creo.fluid_tank: Potions can be stored into and transferred between a Create fluid tank using pipes and a tank.
